short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Applies bold style to the first letters of words on web pages to enhance reading speed and comprehension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Bionic Reading is your essential tool for reading web pages more efficiently and effortlessly. Using the Bionic Reading method, this extension enhances your reading experience by highlighting the initial letters of words, making comprehension faster and reducing cognitive load.

Inspired by the principles of Bionic Reading, this extension is designed to optimize your reading efficiency without compromising comprehension. You can apply it to your favorite website, ensuring that you maintain focus and naturally accelerate your reading speed.

Features:

Easy Activation: Simply click on the extension icon to activate Web Bionic Reading on any webpage.
Enhanced Concentration: By highlighting the initial letters of words, it minimizes distractions and keeps your brain focused.
Accessibility: Ideal for users with ADHD, dyslexia, or anyone seeking a smoother reading experience.
Your feedback is invaluable in shaping future updates of Web Bionic Reading, so feel free to share your ideas and suggestions.

Improve your reading today with Web Bionic Reading!
